The California state treasurer, Bill Lockyer , on Monday held a conference call in which he took issue with the critics of the current pension system. They've confused the near-term budget shortfalls with the long-term funding obligations, and grossly inflated the size of the long-term liabilities, he said. " Looking for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Michael Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson .
